title: Pixel 2XL Camera App Crashing/Flashlight not working/Can't open app as: Google Translate
content:
Hi everybody,
Currently I am having some problems with Pixel 2Xl phones:
- Camera crashing when oppen.
- Can't turn on Flashlight.
- Other dependent apps hang and crash when those apps use camera.
- Can't open Google translate App.
This is the main phone that I use in my daily work, which makes my work inoperable.
I tried: factory reset a lot of times but it didn't work.
I look forward to all the suggestions from everyone. Thanks
